document.text:
From 
To 
Cc 
Subject: RE: SDNY investigation 
Date: Fri, 19 Jul 2019 16:16:35 +0000 
Attachments: 2019-07-13, JE,_individual_subpoenadf 
Following up on our hone conversation a few minutes ago, thank you for being in touch and advising us of your 
representation of in connection with his receipt of a grand jury subpoena, which is attached. So you have 
contact info for our full team, we're all reachable anytime at the copied emails or by phone at: 
As we discussed on the phone, I understand you'll need to have the opportunity to speak with him further, and so it's fine 
for us to speak mid-next week. And as I also mentioned, we don't currently have any reason to believe 
that'
I  has 
done anything wrong; we would like to speak with him about his knowledge of and interactions with Jeffrey Epstein, 
particularly in connection with recent statements he has made to the press about comments Epstein made to him about 
Epstein's prior conduct. 
Please let us know if any additional information would be helpful, and we look forward to being in touch with you next 
week. 
thank you, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00021643
